text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant... I need... to trainmore!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Checking in with Mejiro McQueen, I<n>see that she is pushing
herself<n>especially hard today.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I cannot afford to let myself disgrace<n>the Mejiro name any
further.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
"Do I find it hard to channel strength<n>into my legs?" I don't
think so!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She appears to be incredibly flustered<n>by something, and it
is certainly<n>affecting her running ability.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Wh-what's this? My entire body is...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Her body wobbles a bit before<n>crumbling to the ground.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After an examination at the Academy<n>infirmary, it appears
she is suffering<n>from a mild case of anemia.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The root cause appears to be a lack<n>of nutritional intake. Is
she actually<n>eating properly?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: McQueen! I heard you collapsed! Are<n>you all—

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Oh, uh... Sorry!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Um, hello. I'm Mejiro Ryan.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Are you McQueen's trainer?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I see... but you still went out of your<n>way to help her, right?
Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Do you know why she ended up<n>collapsing out there?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I tell Mejiro Ryan everything I heard<n>from the infirmary
staff.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Anemia caused by a lack of<n>nutrients... I see.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I thought something was off leading<n>up to her tryout race. I
really<n>should've spoken to her...
choice_data_list: Sounds like you were keeping an eye on her.
Sounds like you were keeping an eye on her.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Yeah. But I wasn't able to do<n>anything for her...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
You've probably figured it out<n>already, but I'm also a
member of the<n>Mejiro family. We're not siblings,<n>but...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: McQueen and I grew up on the estate<n>together.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
She's always taken her future<n>objectives real seriously; to
the point<n>where I think she pushes herself way<n>too hard
sometimes.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I wish she'd realize she's perfect<n>just the way she is.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Oh, shoot! I need to go!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Sorry for barging in. Please excuse<n>me!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: And, um... please take care of<n>McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Entrusting me with her family, Mejiro<n>Ryan hurries off.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Shortly after, Mejiro McQueen wakes<n>up.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
So that's what happened... Losing<n>consciousness in the
middle of<n>training...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'm very sorry for causing you so<n>much trouble, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'm feeling right as rain now! I should<n>get back to traini—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Gurgle...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Eek!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
O-of course I am! A Mejiro always<n>has her day planned out
perfectly, and<n>that includes the consumption of three<n>
nutritious meals!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Though with the tryouts, I may have<n>decreased the amount I
ate during<n>those meals...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
My collapse had nothing to do with<n>my eating habits! I
simply haven't<n>been training hard enough!
choice_data_list: Can you show me your dietary plan?
Can you show me your dietary plan?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: What? Um, I suppose that's fine...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: McQueen passes over her dietary<n>notes.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If she is indeed following this plan,<n>then she's only getting
the bare<n>minimum in required nutrition. This<n>could be why
she's having strength<n>issues.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Well? As I said, this should be plenty<n>good enough.
choice_data_list: I think it may be a bit too restrictive.
I think it may be a bit too restrictive.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Wh-what? Really?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I suppose I shouldn't feel the need to<n>hide anything from
you, given how<n>much you've been looking out for<n>me...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Very well. The truth of the matter is<n>that I have a good
reason for following<n>this plan.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: It's just that... You see...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I have a tendency to gain weight<n>easily.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: It can even happen just by following<n>a normal dietary plan.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I couldn't possibly allow anyone to<n>see a flabby Mejiro
belly at the<n>tryouts!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: So that's why I thought it best to limit<n>myself...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: But in the end, I had my priorities<n>backwards.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
It seems I have some reflection to do.<n>I apologize again for
all the trouble<n>I've caused you today.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With those words, Mejiro McQueen<n>makes her way to the
doors of the<n>infirmary.
